content: front/instep sts the last 32 36 40 sts row 2 rs p3 *k1 sl 1 repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 round 1 needle 2 work across 16 18 20 instep sts in will be the back/sole sts and will be worked on the back needle row 3 k3 purl to end of row established pattern sm k2tog knit to end row 4 p3 *sl 1 k1 repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 round 2 needle 1 knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm work in k1 p1 rib for 1½ inches work across 16 18 20 instep sts in established pattern repeat row 1-4 8 9 10 times there will be 16 18 20 garter round 2 needle 2 work across 16 18 20 instep sts in leg edge sts for pickup after turning the heel established pattern sm k1 ssk knit to end knit even for 3 rnds round 3 needle 1 knit to marker sm work across 16 18 20 turn the heel instep sts in established pattern begin romantical pattern with ws facing continuing to knit flat on the back needle round 3 needle 2 work across 16 18 20 instep sts in round 1 k0 2 4 *k4 yo sl2kpsso yo k3 yo sl2kpsso yo k2 row 1 ws sl 1 p16 18 20 p2tog p1 turn work established pattern sm knit to end repeat from * one more time knit to end of round row 2 rs sl 1 k3 ssk k1 turn work round 2 and all even rnds knit row 3 sl 1 purl to 1 st before the gap p2tog across the gap p1 repeat rnds 2 & 3 until 32 36 40 sts rem on both needles round 3 k0 2 4 *k3 yo k2tog k1 ssk yo k1 yo k2tog k1 turn work redistribute sts placing 32 36 40 instep sts on the front needle ssk yo k1 repeat from * one more time knit to end of round row 4 sl 1 knit to 1 st before the gap ssk across the gap k1 and 32 36 40 sole sts on the back needle round 5 k0 2 4 *k2 ssk yo k3 ssk yo k4 yo k2tog repeat from turn work * one more time knit to end of round instep round 7 k0 2 4 *k3 ssk yo k7 yo k2tog k1 repeat from * one repeat row 3 & 4 until all the heel sts have been worked ending continue working in established pattern across the front needle more time knit to end of round with row 4 18 20 22 sts rem on back needle and in stockinette across the back needle until the foot measures round 9 k0 2 4 *k4 ssk yo k5 yo k2tog k2 repeat from * one 1½ 1¾ 2 inches short of the desired length more time knit to end of round pick up stitches round 11 k0 2 4 *k5 ssk
